card.name: Agriculture
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

card.name: Archery
card.dogma: I demand you draw a [1], then transfer the highest card in your hand to my hand!

card.name: Clothing
card.dogma: Meld a card from your hand of different color from any card on your board.
Draw and score a [1] for each color present on your board not present on any other player's board.

card.name: Code of Laws
card.dogma: You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards left.

card.name: City States
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top card with a [TOWER] from your board to my board if you have at least four [TOWER] on your board! If you do, draw a [1]!

card.name: Domestication
card.dogma: Meld the lowest card in your hand. Draw a [1].

card.name: Masonry
card.dogma: You may meld any number of cards from your hand, each with a [TOWER]. If you melded four or more cards, claim the Monument achievement.

card.name: Metalworking
card.dogma: Draw and reveal a [1]. If it has a [TOWER], score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.

card.name: Mysticism
card.dogma: Draw a [1]. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a [1].

card.name: Oars
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a card with a [CROWN] from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a [1].
If no cards were transferred due to this demand, draw a [1].

card.name: Pottery
card.dogma: You may return up to three cards from your hand. If you returned any cards, draw and score a card of value equal to the number of cards you returned.
Draw a [1].

card.name: Sailing
card.dogma: Draw and meld a [1].

card.name: The Wheel
card.dogma: Draw two [1].

card.name: Tools
card.dogma: You may return three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a [3].
You may return a [3] from your hand. If you do, draw three [1].

card.name: Writing
card.dogma: Draw a [2].

card.name: Calendar
card.dogma: If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two [3].

card.name: Canal Building
card.dogma: You may exchange all the highest cards in your hand with all the highest cards in your score pile.

card.name: Currency
card.dogma: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a [2] for every different value of card you returned.

card.name: Construction
card.dogma: I demand you transfer two cards from your hand to my hand, then draw a [2]!
If you are the only player with five top cards, claim the Empire achievement.

card.name: Fermenting
card.dogma: Draw a [2] for every two [LEAF] icons on your board.

card.name: Mapmaking
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a [1] from your score pile to my score pile.
If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a [1].

card.name: Mathematics
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

card.name: Monotheism
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top card on your board of a different color from any card on my board to my score pile! If you do, draw and tuck a [1]!
Draw and tuck a [1].

card.name: Philosophy
card.dogma: You may splay left any one color of your cards.
You may score a card from your hand.

card.name: Road Building
card.dogma: Meld one or two cards from your hand. If you melded two, you may transfer your top red card to another player's board. In exchange, transfer that player's top green card to your board.

card.name: Alchemy
card.dogma: Draw and reveal a [4] for every 3 [TOWER] icons on your board. If any of the drawn cards are red, return the cards drawn and all cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
Meld a card from your hand, then score a card from your hand.

card.name: Education
card.dogma: You may return the highest card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the highest card remaining in your score pile.

card.name: Compass
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [LEAF] from your board to my board, and then transfer a top card without a [LEAF] from my board to your board.

card.name: Engineering
card.dogma: I demand you transfer all top cards with a [TOWER] from your board to my score pile!
You may splay your red cards left.

card.name: Feudalism
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a card with a [TOWER] from your hand to my hand!
You may splay your yellow or purple cards left.

card.name: Machinery
card.dogma: I demand you exchange all cards in your hand with all the highest cards in my hand!
Score a card from your hand with a [TOWER]. You may splay your red cards left.

card.name: Medicine
card.dogma: I demand you exchange the highest card in your score pile with the lowest card in my score pile.

card.name: Optics
card.dogma: Draw and meld a [3]. If it has a [CROWN], draw and score a [4]. Otherwise, transfer a card from your score pile to the score pile of an opponent with fewer points than you.

card.name: Paper
card.dogma: You may splay your green or blue cards left.
Draw a [4] for every color you have splayed left.

card.name: Translation
card.dogma: You may meld all the cards in your score pile. If you meld one, you must meld them all.
If each top card on your board has a [CROWN], claim the World achievement.

card.name: Anatomy
card.dogma: I demand you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!

card.name: Colonialism
card.dogma: Draw and tuck a [3]. If it has a [CROWN], repeat this dogma effect.

card.name: Enterprise
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [CROWN] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and meld a [4]!
You may splay your green cards right.

card.name: Experimentation
card.dogma: Draw and meld a [5].

card.name: Gunpowder
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top card with a [TOWER] from your board to my score pile!
If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a [2].

card.name: Invention
card.dogma: You may splay right any one color of your cards currently splayed left. If you do, draw and score a [4].
If you have five colors splayed, each in any direction, claim the Wonder achievement.

card.name: Navigation
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a [2] or [3] from your score pile to my score pile!

card.name: Perspective
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand for every two [BULB] icons on your board.

card.name: Printing Press
card.dogma: You may return a card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the top purple card on your board.
You may splay your blue cards right.

card.name: Reformation
card.dogma: You may tuck a card from your hand for every two [LEAF] icons on your board.
You may splay your yellow or purple cards right.

card.name: Astronomy
card.dogma: Draw and reveal a [6]. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
If all non-purple top cards on your board are value [6] or higher, claim the Universe achievement.

card.name: Banking
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [FACTORY] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and score a [5].
You may splay your green cards right.

card.name: Chemistry
card.dogma: You may splay your blue cards right.
Draw and score a card of value one higher than the highest top card on your board and then return a card from your score pile.

card.name: Coal
card.dogma: Draw and tuck a [5].
You may splay your red cards right.
You may score any one of your top cards. If you do, also score the card beneath it.

card.name: Measurement
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, splay any one color of your cards right, and draw a card of value equal to the number of cards of that color on your board.

card.name: Physics
card.dogma: Draw three [6] and reveal them. If two or more of the drawn cards are of the same color, return the drawn cards and all the cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.

card.name: Societies
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [BULB] from your board to my board! If you do, draw a [5]!

card.name: Statistics
card.dogma: I demand you transfer the highest card in your score pile to your hand! If you do, and have only one card in your hand afterwards, repeat this demand!
You may splay your yellow cards right.

card.name: Steam Engine
card.dogma: Draw and tuck two [4], then score your bottom yellow card.

card.name: The Pirate Code
card.dogma: I demand you transfer two cards of value [4] or less from your score pile to my score pile!
If any card was transferred due to the demand, score the lowest top card with a [CROWN] from your board.

card.name: Atomic Theory
card.dogma: You may splay your blue cards right.
Draw and meld a [7].

card.name: Canning
card.dogma: You may draw and tuck a [6]. If you do, score all your top cards without a [FACTORY].
You may splay your yellow cards right.

card.name: Classification
card.dogma: Reveal the color of a card from your hand. Take into your hand all cards of that color from all other players' hands. Then, meld all cards of that color from your hand.

card.name: Democracy
card.dogma: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you have returned more cards than any other player due to Democracy this phase, draw and score an [8].

card.name: Emancipation
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a card from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a [6]!
You may splay your red or purple cards right.

card.name: Encyclopedia
card.dogma: You may meld all the highest cards in your score pile. If you meld one of the highest, you must meld all of the highest.

card.name: Industrialization
card.dogma: Draw and tuck a [6] for every two [FACTORY] icons on your board.
You may splay your red or purple cards right.

card.name: Machine Tools
card.dogma: Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.

card.name: Metric System
card.dogma: If your green cards are splayed right, you may splay any color of your cards right.
You may splay your green cards right.

card.name: Vaccination
card.dogma: I demand you return all the lowest cards in your score pile! If you returned any, draw and meld a [6]!
If any card was returned as a result of the demand, draw and meld a [7].

card.name: Bicycle
card.dogma: You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.

card.name: Combustion
card.dogma: I demand you transfer two cards from your score pile to my score pile!

card.name: Electricity
card.dogma: Return all your top cards without a [FACTORY], then draw an [8] for each card you returned.

card.name: Evolution
card.dogma: You may choose to either draw and score an [8] and then return a card from your score pile, or draw a card of value one higher than the highest card in your score pile.

card.name: Explosives
card.dogma: I demand you transfer your three highest cards from your hand to my hand! If you do, and then have no cards in hand, draw a [7]!

card.name: Lighting
card.dogma: You may tuck up to three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a [7] for every different value of card you tucked.

card.name: Publications
card.dogma: You may rearrange the order of one color of cards on your board.
You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.

card.name: Railroad
card.dogma: Return all cards from your hand, then draw three [6].
You may splay up any one color of your cards currently splayed right.

card.name: Refrigeration
card.dogma: I demand you return half (rounded down) of the cards in your hand.
You may score a card from your hand.

card.name: Sanitation
card.dogma: I demand you exchange the two highest cards in your hand with the lowest card in my hand!

card.name: Antibiotics
card.dogma: You may return up to three cards from your hand. For every different value of card that you returned, draw two [8].

card.name: Corporations
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [FACTORY] from your board to my score pile! If you do, draw and meld an [8]!
Draw and meld an [8].

card.name: Empiricism
card.dogma: Choose two colors, then draw and reveal a [9]. If it is either of the colors you chose, meld it and you may splay your cards of that color up.
If you have twenty or more [BULB] icons on your board, you win.

card.name: Flight
card.dogma: If your red cards are splayed up, you may splay any color of your cards up.
You may splay your red cards up.

card.name: Mass Media
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, choose a value, and return all cards of that value from all score piles.
You may splay your purple cards up.

card.name: Mobility
card.dogma: I demand you transfer your two highest non-red cards without a [FACTORY] from your board to my score pile! If you transferred any cards, draw an [8]!

card.name: Quantum Theory
card.dogma: You may return up to two cards from your hand. If you return two, draw a [10] and then draw and score a [10].

card.name: Rocketry
card.dogma: Return a card in any other player's score pile for every two [CLOCK] icons on your board.

card.name: Skyscrapers
card.dogma: I demand you transfer a top non-yellow card with a [CLOCK] from your board to my board! If you do, score the card beneath it, and return all other cards from that pile!

card.name: Socialism
card.dogma: You may tuck all cards from your hand. If you tuck one, you must tuck them all. If you tucked at least one purple card, take all the lowest cards in each other player's hand into your hand.

card.name: Collaboration
card.dogma: I demand you draw two [9] and reveal them. Transfer the card of my choice to my board, and meld the other.
If you have ten or more green cards on your board, you win.

card.name: Composites
card.dogma: I demand you transfer all but one card from your hand to my hand! Also, transfer the highest card from your score pile to my score pile!

card.name: Computers
card.dogma: You may splay your red cards or your green cards up.
Draw and meld a [10], then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

card.name: Ecology
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand and draw two [10].

card.name: Fission
card.dogma: I demand you draw a [10]! If it is red, remove all hands, boards, and score piles from the game! If this occurs, the dogma action is complete.
Return a top card other than Fission from any player's board.

card.name: Genetics
card.dogma: Draw and meld a [10]. Score all cards beneath it.

card.name: Satellites
card.dogma: Return all cards from your hand, and draw three [8].
You may splay your purple cards up.
Meld a card from your hand and then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

card.name: Services
card.dogma: I demand you transfer all the highest cards from your score pile to my hand! If you transferred any cards, then transfer a top card from my board without a [LEAF] to your hand!

card.name: Specialization
card.dogma: Reveal a card from your hand. Take into your hand the top card of that color from all other players' boards.
You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.

card.name: Suburbia
card.dogma: You may tuck any number of cards from your hand. Draw and score a [1] for each card you tucked.

card.name: A.I.
card.dogma: Draw and score a [10].
If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.

card.name: Bioengineering
card.dogma: Transfer a top card with a [LEAF] from any other player's board to your score pile.
If any player has fewer than three [LEAF] icons on their board, the single player with the most [LEAF] icons on their board wins.

card.name: Databases
card.dogma: I demand you return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile!

card.name: Globalization
card.dogma: I demand you return a top card with a [LEAF] on your board!
Draw and score a [6]. If no player has more [LEAF] icons than [FACTORY] icons on their board, the single player with the most points wins.

card.name: Miniaturization
card.dogma: You may return a card from your hand. If you returned a [10], draw a [10] for every different value of card in your score pile.

card.name: Robotics
card.dogma: Score your top green card. Draw and meld a [10], then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

card.name: Self Service
card.dogma: Execute the non-demand dogma effects of any other top card on your board for yourself only.
If you have more achievements than each other player, you win.

card.name: Software
card.dogma: Draw and score a [10].
Draw and meld two [10], then execute the second card's non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

card.name: Stem Cells
card.dogma: You may score all cards from your hand. If you score one, you must score them all.

card.name: The Internet
card.dogma: You may splay your green cards up.
Draw and score a [10].
Draw and meld a [10] for every two [CLOCK] icons on your board.
